description: {"blocks":[{"key":"drhfq","text":"Processing human frontal cortex brain tissue for population-scale Oxford Nanopore long-read DNA sequencing SOP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":110}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mlcn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ddjg","text":"At the NIH's Center for Alzheimer's and Related Dementias (CARD) https://card.nih.gov/research-programs/long-read-sequencing we will generate long-read sequencing data from roughly 4000 patients with Alzheimer's disease, frontotemporal dementia, Lewy body dementia, and healthy subjects. With this research, we will build a public resource consisting of long-read genome sequencing data from a large number of confirmed people with Alzheimer's disease and related dementias and healthy individuals. To generate this large-scale nanopore sequencing data we have developed a protocol for processing and long-read sequencing human frontal cortex brain tissue, targeting an N50 of  ~30kb and ~30X coverage.   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":59}],"data":{}},{"key":"aj6qv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b34ab","text":"†Correspondence to: Kimberley Billingsley billingsleykj@nih.gov and Cornelis Blauwendraat cornelis.blauwendraat@nih.gov","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":42,"length":21},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":90,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":42,"length":21},{"key":2,"offset":90,"length":29}],"data":{}},{"key":"254q3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5u34l","text":"Acknowledgements:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anp6l","text":"We would like to thank the  Nanopore team (Androo Markham \u0026Hannah Lucio), Circulomics Inc team (Jeffrey Burke, Michelle Kim, Duncan Kilburn \u0026 Kelvin Liu) and the whole CARD long-read team listed below =\u003e UCSC: Benedict Paten, Mikhail Kolmogorov, Miten Jain, Kishwar Shafin, Trevor Pesout; steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ek8r5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dhi82","text":"\nPart 1: Brain Tissue Cutting (~2.5 hours for 16 samples)\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5u4na","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a8nht","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"alsec","text":"Add dry ice to a ice bucket","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"frni3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ht85","text":"Place supplies (sterile weigh boat, razor blade, labeled empty 2mL protein LoBind microcentrifuge tubes and cooling block) in dry ice and allow to chill for ~  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":159,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"208B91CE5D2511EC9B8C0A58A9FEAC02","id":"79918","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bk1h6","text":"Obtain tissue samples from  freezer and place in dry ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"27CFED6C5D2511EC9B8C0A58A9FEAC02","id":"49196","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gpp8","text":"Wear all necessary protective equipment (lab coat, face shield, double gloved) and complete the following steps within a chemical fume hood","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"qumb","text":"Weigh labeled empty tube to tare scale, ensuring tube is centered","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7v2g9","text":"Working in the chemical fume hood, place the chilled weighing boat on top of the cooling tissue (use right hand to grip blade and cut tissue), use left hand just above, in between tissue and in front of hood, to shield any flying pieces)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6lp7g","text":"Using the chilled razor blade, gently lift the cut tissue piece and transfer to the chilled labeled empty tube and weigh immediately, place back in dry ice immediately to avoid tissue thawing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fs8r","text":"Add or remove tissue using the method outlined above as required by input specifications ~40mg for frontal cortex, DNA recovery varies based on amount of gray matter vs. white matter)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avh9b","text":"Dispose of used weighing boat in a burn box and razor blade in the sharps waste container between each sample to prevent inter-sample contamination and keep all tissue samples on dry ice when not in use","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fjnq2","text":"Part 2: TissueRuptor Brain Tissue Disruption (~3 hours)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":55}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6dvcu","text":"Place 15mL round  tubes and cold Buffer CT on ice, chill centrifuge to , and warm ThermoMixer to  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"ee530","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CBE546AF5D2511ECA43A0A58A9FEAC02","id":"49197","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DBA424A05DC911ECA37B0B6FE8CB1E69","id":"49198","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eb92e","text":"Transfer brain tissue from previous steps to 15mL round tubes (keep on ice during the entire disruption process)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"856v2","text":"Add   of cold Buffer CT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7shjh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"E300C6FF5D2511ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"89064","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1h1e4","text":" Submerge TissueRuptor probe tip in buffer and blend at max speed for  (place probe tip off to side to be cleaned later)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"EAD189865D2511ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"79919","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hmts","text":"Transfer homogenate to a 2 mL Protein LoBind microcentrifuge tube including all undisrupted tissue chunks and any foam that forms","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1kjs1","text":"Pellet homogenate by centrifuging at 6,000 x g and   for  . Discard supernatant (pellet may not be visible, so pipette carefully and avoid pipetting from the bottom of tube)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7abps","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FB7E478D5D2511ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"49199","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"FB7E48EF5D2511ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"79920","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3tl0d","text":"Add  of cold Buffer CT and pipette mix 10X with a wide bore P1000 pipette to resuspend tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"1sts","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"06E8E7305D2611ECAFE411DF6F9934D7","id":"89065","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cppgk","text":"Pellet homogenate by centrifuging at 6,000 x g and   for  . Discard supernatant (pellet may not be visible, so pipette carefully and avoid pipetting from the bottom of tube)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"15AFA8685D2611ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"49200","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"15AFA6F15D2611ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"79921","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eal8s","text":"Pulse vortex for  x 5 times (max setting) to dislodge pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":1,"guid":"1B9EC8DA5D2611ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"79922","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6k09j","text":"Add   of Proteinase K to the previous pellet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"20FDF8305D2611ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"89066","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1jiv2","text":"Add  1X TE pH 8","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"260B2C005D2611ECA4400A58A9FEAC02","id":"89067","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
